change.changenote: Section 83 BEFORE self-repealed by BC Reg 189/2019, effective December 2, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In this section, transitioned registrant means a person who, on December 1, 2019, is a registrant.

A transitioned registrant who applies before April 1, 2020 to renew the registration of the transitioned registrant's assisted living residence must include in the written application to be submitted under section 6 (1) (a) [requirements for registration] all content described in Schedule A that was not provided in respect of the current registration.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: sections 5 (1) [qualifications for registrants] and 15 (2) (a) [if more than one class or non-residents] do not apply to a transitioned registrant, and
section 23 [additional requirements for Supportive Recovery class] does not apply to a transitioned registrant who operates an assisted living residence of the Supportive Recovery class.
